product_name: Louis Garneau Nimbus Bike Gloves - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Louis Garneau Nimbus Bike Gloves vent moisture and feature gel palms that absorb vibrations, reduce nerve pressure and prevent hand fatigue on your longest bike rides. Breathable, perforated palm has silicone structure and Biogel padding. Gel palms reduce pressure on the ulnar and median nerves. Palm moisture dissipates easily and helps stabilize hand temperature. Lightweight backs on the women's Louis Garneau Nimbus Bike Gloves have Air Zone Ventilation. Silicone-coated finger pulls help remove gloves; fingers have reflectivity. Rip-and-stick-adjustable cuffs; microfiber wipe at thumb. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Louis Garneau Nimbus Bike Gloves vent moisture and feature gel palms that absorb vibrations, reduce nerve pressure and prevent hand fatigue on your longest bike rides.
